title: The Vanishing of Ethan Carter + Update 3 repack Mr DJ
description:
LOSSLESS Repack by Mr DJ (Me)
The Vanishing Of Ethan Carter full game....

Repack features:

Do not cut/recoded 
Game Version - v1.0.10706.0 (Update 3);
Voice Language : English and Polish; 
Subtitles Language: English,Italian,German,French,Polish,Russian,Spanish ;
Precracked - install and play 
Install Time - 6 minutes [Quad Core];
Final size: 9.29gb;
Operating system: Win XP,Win Vista,Win 7,Win 8,Win 8.1 (both 32bit and 64bit);
Crack based on : CODEX

Update 1, Update 2 and Update 3 has been applied already, all you have to do is install and play....

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS :

DISABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT) as the antivirus will mark 'setup' as a suspicious file,, making it unable to launch setup or may run it but with some glitches,, same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...Latest 'Dotnetframe' is required to run the setup (provided)

After running setup,, click on 'Configure',, specify the install directory,, click on next and next,, select the necessary software (direct x and both visual c++ provided in Redist folder),, again next,, finally on 'Install',, after install,, play the game from desktop shortcut ( open x64 shortcut for 64bit windows users and x86 shortcut for 32bit windows users)....

Always open the game using 'Run as administrator' to avoid any savegame/crash issue. If it still crashes, lower the graphics settings from 'Launcher.exe' in 'Binaries' folder in your installed game directory.......

IF YOU LIKE THE REPACK,, GIVE FEEDBACK AND SEED.......

LIKE THE GAME,, BUY IT AND SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS.......
